external_games.name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Break The Fog MP012

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Break the Fog MP012
summary: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Break The Fog is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes the map pack 012.
